DOC.brief_summary: Nitric oxide ( NO ) soluble gas , continuously synthesized endothelium , contribute importantly vasodilator tone coronary systemic circulation activate guanylyl cyclase vascular smooth muscle , cause relaxation . Although regional synthesis NO endothelium contribute local vasodilator tone , Stamler co-worker propose regional vascular tone may also regulate NO transported lung hemoglobin consequence enhance bind NO reactive thiols oxygenate hemoglobin . This study design determine contribution hemoglobin-transported NO forearm microvascular dilator tone healthy subject rest regional hypoxia associate forearm exercise stress , measurement make regional blockade endothelial NO synthesis . Findings study may relevant understand physiological contribution therapeutic potential hemoglobin-transported NO regulation vasodilator tone diseases condition associate regional endothelial dysfunction reduce endothelial NO bioactivity ( e.g. , hypertension , diabetes mellitus , hypercholesterolemia , cigarette smoking , estrogen deficiency ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Effects Endothelium-Derived Versus Hemoglobin-Transported Nitric Oxide Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Nitric oxide ( NO ) soluble gas , continuously synthesized endothelium , contribute importantly vasodilator tone coronary systemic circulation activate guanylyl cyclase vascular smooth muscle , cause relaxation . Although regional synthesis NO endothelium contribute local vasodilator tone , Stamler co-worker propose regional vascular tone may also regulate NO transported lung hemoglobin consequence enhance bind NO reactive thiols oxygenate hemoglobin . This study design determine contribution hemoglobin-transported NO forearm microvascular dilator tone healthy subject rest regional hypoxia associate forearm exercise stress , measurement make regional blockade endothelial NO synthesis . Findings study may relevant understand physiological contribution therapeutic potential hemoglobin-transported NO regulation vasodilator tone diseases condition associate regional endothelial dysfunction reduce endothelial NO bioactivity ( e.g. , hypertension , diabetes mellitus , hypercholesterolemia , cigarette smoking , estrogen deficiency ) .
DOC.criteria: All volunteer subject must 21 75 year age , good health , must provide informed , write consent participation study . No subject history evidence present past hypertension ( blood pressure great 145/95 mmHg ) , hypercholesterolemia ( LDL cholesterol great 130 mg/dL ) , diabetes mellitus ( fast blood glucose great 120 mg/dL ) , smoke within 2 year , cardiac disease , peripheral vascular disease , coagulopathy , disease predispose vasculitis Raynaud 's phenomenon . No volunteer subject allow take medication ( oral contraceptive agent allow ) vitamin supplement least one month prior study allow take aspirin one week prior study . Pregnancy test required woman reproductive age exclude current pregnancy .
